review: Horrible!  This worked fine for about a month.  Then it stopped working.  I spent half an hour waiting for customer support, then an hour doing every troubleshoot known to man.  Finally, they told me that I had to reset my DNS numbers on my router.  It reached a point of being ridiculous.  They don't produce a good product, and don't stand by it in case of trouble.  It ended up in the trash.
author: Candice Conway "Dessertcrazy"
